item.title: Detective Instinct: Farewell, My Beloved
item.description:
Title: Detective Instinct: Farewell, My Beloved
Genre: Adventure
Developer: Armonica LLC
Publisher: Armonica LLC
Release Date: Nov 26, 2025




About This Game

Detective Instinct: Farewell, My Beloved is a brand new Detective ADV/Visual Novel, in the style of classic adventure games from Japan. Investigate areas and interrogate witnesses on the path towards solving the mystery and uncovering a sinister conspiracy!

KEY FEATURES:

  • A dramatic and moving story, inspired by hard-boiled crime fiction, classic cinema, and other classic adventure (ADV) games

  • Classic command-select gameplay, designed to maximize player experimentation and deduction while minimizing the need to brute force solutions

  • A unique mixed-media art style, combining highly expressive 2D pixel art portraits, old-school pre-rendered 3D backgrounds, and traditional illustrations

  • A colorful cast of characters with which to converse, with many unique interactions and optional dialogue that rewards exploration and curiosity

  • Lavish original soundtrack in various musical styles, featuring many live instrument performances

Mature Content Description

The developers describe the content like this:

This game features a story centered around murder and implied violent criminal activity and contains some mature themes. It does not feature graphic depictions of violence.



System Requirements

Windows

    Minimum:
    • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
    • OS: Windows 10
    • Memory: 4 GB RAM
    Recommended:
    • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

item.title: Cowboy Life Simulator
item.description:
Title: Cowboy Life Simulator
Genre: Action , Adventure , Casual , RPG , Simulation , Early Access
Developer: Odd Qubit
Publisher: RockGame S.A.
Franchise: RockGame S.A.
Release Date: Nov 26, 2025
Early Access Release Date: Nov 26, 2025




About This Game

Cowboy Life Simulator is an immersive and relaxing single-player Wild West ranching simulator. Step into the boots of a stressed-out businessman who, after a failed venture, decides to change his life and buys a farm in the Wild West. Purchase your first goat and a bag of grain, get to know the local community, and explore diverse, vibrant locations.
Run your ranch and discover what this wild frontier has to offer!


  • Immersive Open World ‚Äì Travel across a map filled with diverse locations, uncover its secrets, and face challenges.
  • Ranch Building ‚Äì Build your own ranch, construct utility buildings, farms, and decorations.
  • Farming & Animal Caretaking ‚Äì Plant, tend to, and harvest over 20 different crops, and take care of your farm animals.
  • Crafting ‚Äì Create essential items for survival and ranch management.
  • Decorating ‚Äì Decorate your home to your taste with everyday items like an axe or cans of food.
  • Engaging Storylines ‚Äì Dive into the extensive history of Bravestand and its surroundings, getting to know your neighbors, near and far, through engaging quests.
  • Interesting Characters ‚Äì Chat with colorful Wild West inhabitants and become part of the local community.
  • Mysteries to Unfold ‚Äì Discover the secrets and dilemmas of Bravestand's residents and find out what awaits you in even the most distant corners of the map.
  • Sophisticated Progression ‚Äì Develop your character's skills and level up in the unique Farm, Fame, Frontier experience system.
  • Light Survival ‚Äì Collect resources scattered across the map and pay attention to your character's needs.
  • Combat ‚Äì Shoot various available weapons, upgrade them, and use them to fight animals and gangs terrorizing the area.



The Wild West is teeming with life, especially the small town of Bravestand. Each resident has their habits, favorite places, and problems. Make friends with them, learn the history and life of the town by helping solve the problems of your new neighbors and local residents. Help out and strengthen the bonds of friendship, and you'll gain not only good neighbors but also devoted friends!





Run your ranch in your own style. You decide where your house will stand, where the goat pen will be, and where you'll sow grain and plant cabbage. Create your own corner of the Wild West with many available decorations and buildings. Run your ranch your way, take care of animals, and plant diverse crops. Trade with town residents to get new recipes and gain access to unknown resources.





And after a day's work on the ranch, pull out your revolver and hop on your horse to seek adventure in the farthest corners of the Wild West, uncovering its most hidden secrets! Find out what lurks in the abandoned mine and what's the deal with that giant rock?

Join the Cowboy Community!


Become part of the Cowboy Life Simulator community! Join our growing Discord server and be first in line for all news and updates about the game's development ‚Äì straight from the developers, from the heart of the studio! Follow our social media to stay up-to-date with future plans, such as upcoming playtests, new feature additions, and future projects ‚Äì don't miss out on anything!




Descrierea con»õinutului pentru adul»õi indisponibilƒÉ.

System Requirements

Windows

    Minimum:
    • OS: Windows 10
    • Processor: Intel Core i5-8400 / AMD Ryzen 5 2600
    • Memory: 8 GB RAM
    • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1070 8GB or Radeon equivalent
    • Storage: 15 GB available space
    Recommended:
    • OS: Windows 10
    • Processor: Intel Core i7-8700 /AMD Ryzen 7 2700
    • Memory: 16 GB RAM
    • Graphics: GeForce RTX 3060 8GB or Radeon equivalent
    • Storage: 15 GB available space

item.title: Mount & Blade II: Bannerlord - War Sails
item.description:
Title: Mount & Blade II: Bannerlord - War Sails
Genre: Action , Indie , RPG , Simulation , Strategy
Developer: TaleWorlds Entertainment
Publisher: TaleWorlds Entertainment
Franchise: Mount & Blade II: Bannerlord , Mount & Blade
Release Date: Nov 26, 2025




About This Content

Mount & Blade II: Bannerlord - War Sails

Sail the high seas, lead mighty fleets, and forge your legacy in War Sails , the epic single-player expansion for Mount & Blade II: Bannerlord . Bringing naval warfare to Bannerlord for the first time, War Sails lets players command powerful ships, engage in thrilling sea battles, and master maritime conquest.

Embark on daring naval adventures with new mechanics, territories, and challenges. Customize your fleet, conquer settlements, and carve your legend on the high seas!

MEET THE NORDS, A NEW VIKING-INSPIRED FACTION

Chart your course to the Northern Kingdom, home of the fearless Nords‚Äîlegendary seafarers and masters of close-quarters combat. Explore a land of jagged peaks, vast taigas and freezing fjords, where scattered settlements rise like ships from the sea. A bold adventurer may trade their goods, recruit their warriors, join their ranks or challenge their rule. Will you join the North or seize its riches?

MASTER NAVAL WARFARE

War Sails introduces a unique and immersive naval warfare system that has been inspired by accounts of actual medieval sea battles. Featuring realistic wind and water physics, ship-to-ship combat lets you board enemies from multiple points, ram them, or attack from afar.

Captains can seize opportunities by boarding already engaged ships, prepare for an incoming attack by creating a floating fortress or take a risk to tie down several enemies at once - giving their allies an edge elsewhere. They may ram an enemy ship to sink it - or at least throw men off board, shatter oars and compromise buoyancy. Well-placed arrows and ballista fire can also tear through sails, further crippling mobility.

EXPLORE AN EXPANDED WORLD

Calradia has been reimagined with a northern region, a settled island, coastal waters and open seas. The dynamic weather system was also refined to include storms and trade winds. Ships move faster when riding the gales, but beware‚Äîattrition can unravel even the best-laid plans.

The naval systems and Nord faction integrate into Bannerlord‚Äôs world, reshaping trade, warfare, and diplomacy. Ship production and new trade goods add regional variety. Coastal towns may grow rich from this ‚Äî if they can fend off pirates and naval invasions.

Sieges have also been adapted to naval warfare. Armies will have to bring along a fleet and set up a blockade, if they want to stop supplies and reinforcements arriving over sea.

BUILD YOUR FLEET

Players can choose from 18 ship types modelled after historical vessels, each with unique handling, shaped by realistic wind and wave physics. They can be customized with siege engines, cargo holds, sails, rams, and more. Shipyards build and stock vessels based on their town‚Äôs culture and development. Players can also capture ships and figureheads in battle.

EXPAND YOUR ARSENAL

The character system has been extended with Nord hairstyles, beards, and tattoos. Three nautical skills were added that enhance navigation, tactics, and stewardship. There are also many new items including spears, swords, axes, shields, and armor.

Troop trees now include mariner troops that are more effective at sea. Players can also recruit new companions with maritime backgrounds.

LEARN THE ROPES

A new questline introduces players to the seas of Calradia through cinematics, scripted missions, and classic Mount & Blade gameplay. Learn how to command your ship, then take it into battle against a pirate confederacy. Lead a growing fleet of newfound allies as you face a range of nautical challenges.

ENHANCED AUDIO

The sounds of the sea come to life with new Mediterranean and Nordic-inspired musical tracks. Experience rich soundscapes with piercing winds, crashing waves and creaking ships. Feel the heat of battle as steel clashes and sailors cry out.

Mature Content Description

The developers describe the content like this:

This DLC may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: Some Nudity or Sexual Content, Frequent Violence or Gore, General Mature Content



System Requirements

Windows

* Starting January 1st, 2024, the Steam Client will only support Windows 10 and later versions.
    Minimum:
    • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
    • OS *: Windows 7 (64-bit only)
    • Processor: Intel¬Æ Core‚Ñ¢ i3-9100T / AMD Ryzen‚Ñ¢ 3 2200G
    • Memory: 6 GB RAM
    • Graphics: Intel¬Æ UHD Graphics 770 / NVIDIA¬Æ GeForce¬Æ GTX 960 2GB / AMD Radeon‚Ñ¢ RX 570 4GB
    • Storage: 35 GB available space
    • Additional Notes: Integrated GPUs require an additional 2GB of system RAM
    Recommended:
    • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
    • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit only)
    • Processor: Intel¬Æ Core‚Ñ¢ i5-13600K / AMD Ryzen‚Ñ¢ 5 7600X
    • Memory: 8 GB RAM
    • Graphics: NVIDIA¬Æ GeForce¬Æ RTX 3060 8GB / AMD Radeon‚Ñ¢ RX 6600 XT 8GB
    • Storage: 35 GB available space

item.title: My Wife Threw Out My Card Collection (So I Bought a Dump to Find Them All) ‚≠ê
item.description:
Title: My Wife Threw Out My Card Collection (So I Bought a Dump to Find Them All) ‚≠ê
Genre: Action , Casual , Simulation
Developer: Pmdk23
Publisher: Polden Publishing
Release Date: Nov 25, 2025




About This Game

üóëÔ∏è Welcome to the Dump

Explore endless piles of junk, dig up lost cards, and expand your collection. Everything that was once lost ‚Äî can now be found again.

üÉè Features

  • Dig, sort, collect.
    Every pile of trash is a chance to find a rare card.

  • Save the birds
    Pull them out of garbage piles and make them cozy nests.

  • Collectible cards
    Restore your full collection of favorite cards.

  • Humor, references, and trash aesthetics
    A world where garbage is art, and every discovery can become a trophy.

  • No battles. Just trash.
    You just dig. In garbage. For love. And for cards.

üîç Who‚Äôs it for?

For those who love simulators, collecting, irony, and relaxing gameplay.

And maybe for those who still remember their lost card collection.

Descrierea con»õinutului pentru adul»õi indisponibilƒÉ.

System Requirements

Windows

    Minimum:
    • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
    • Processor: Intel Core i3 3.0 GHz or Ryzen 3xxx
    • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 960 4GB VRAM
    • Storage: 10 GB available space

item.title: Captain Wayne - Vacation Desperation
item.description:
Title: Captain Wayne - Vacation Desperation
Genre: Action , Adventure , Indie
Developer: Ciaran Games LLC
Publisher: Silver Lining Interactive
Franchise: Silver Lining Interactive
Release Date: Nov 25, 2025




About This Game

  • Witness an elaborately hand-drawn, action-packed epic inspired by the FPS greats!

  • Make use of the many devastating weapons in Wayne‚Äôs arsenal and achieve maximum destruction!

  • Explore dangerous locales through 8 humongous areas all across Orca Isle!

  • HALF GAME, HALF CARTOON! Delight in the Captain‚Äôs depth-defying tale in CAMPAIGN MODE as you view tons of animated cutscenes exploring his adventure.

  • Experience a high-octane soundtrack that emphasizes AGGRESSION and CHAOS!

  • Go for the gold in our ENDLESS MODE ‚Äì how long can you survive the onslaught?

The hot pink-wearing, fish-chomping, cigar-huffing Captain Wayne refuses to let anything stand between him and his gory conquest to rob and humiliate every rich asshole around the globe.

After losing his arm in a terrible encounter with the legendary Vampire Whale , Wayne replaced it with his trusty shotgun, The Captain's Ol' Reliable , and sailed with it across the seven-and-a-half seas in his vessel, the S.S. Salty .

When an unexpected run-in with a group of evil mercenaries leaves him marooned on Orca Isle with his ship stolen, Wayne starts doing what he does best: annihilating everyone responsible.

Equipped with a double barreled shotgun for an arm, countless explosives, and a bad attitude, you‚Äôll have to go toe-to-toe with The Killer Whales , the most ruthless mercenaries in all the seven-and-a-half seas.


DO YOU HAVE WHAT IT TAKES TO EMBODY THE CAPTAIN? Let‚Äôs find out.

Mow down enemies with your double-barreled arm , rip enemies apart with devious chain-gun fingers , toss a bottle of the explosive Boom Brew , unleash the force of thunder from your palms, or PUNCH THEM ‚ÄòTIL THEY‚ÄôRE PASTE!

Those Killer Whales bastards aren‚Äôt gonna slaughter themselves! It‚Äôs time to rob the rich to feed the badass.

Mature Content Description

The developers describe the content like this:

This game features the ability to turn enemies into a globs of bleeding flesh via shotgun. On top of this, Wayne has a random chance of saying fuck, shit, or damn, at any given moment during the entire playthrough. We're sorry. It's just how he was raised.



System Requirements

Windows

* Starting January 1st, 2024, the Steam Client will only support Windows 10 and later versions.
    Minimum:
    • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
    • OS *: Windows Vista
    • Processor: Intel i3 2100 or higher
    • Memory: 6 GB RAM
    • Graphics: 1 GB of VRAM with OpenGL 3.3 (GeForce GTX 630 or higher)
    • Storage: 900 MB available space
    • Sound Card: One (1) from: Concertina, Hurdy-Gurdy, or Blowhorn
    • Additional Notes: Her bow 'n stern must sort your cargo and prevent any a tide's turn.
    Recommended:
    • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
    • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit)
    • Processor: Intel i5-3570k
    • Memory: 8 GB RAM
    • Graphics: 1 GB of VRAM with OpenGL 3.3 (GeForce GTX 630 or higher)
    • Storage: 900 MB available space
    • Sound Card: Make sure it can handle our game's OST on 500% volume.
    • Additional Notes: An be she big enough to harbour yer cap'n in the privacy o' his own quarters!
